title: 2 WOMEN HYPNOTIZING 1 MAN WITHOUT USING WORDS part 2 / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In the previous part of this video, which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/2pDH2S19oFs
two women hypnotized a man. They are all students of Dr. Marco Paret and participated in his recent masterclass in Russia. They exercised the powerful techniques that they learned. The man went into a deep state of fascination, hypnotic induction and catalepsy. In this part of the video series, we can see how his body continues to respond to the hypnosis. All this was achieved without the use of any words. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
